title: Installation
description: Quick start guide for getting acclimated with gatsby-theme-carbon
---

<PageDescription>

Before you get started, install the required software on your computer.

</PageDescription>

## Install Visual Studio Code

Install Visual Studio Code on any computer running macOS, Windows, or Linux. VSCode’s system requirements are fairly small, so it should run well on most computers.

To install Visual Studio Code visit https://code.visualstudio.com and click the big green Download button. After the download finishes, open the installer and follow the steps to complete the installation.

## Install Lava For Visual Studio Code

To install the extensions, visit https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=GarrettJohnson.language-lava and click the green Install button. The installation process prompts you to open Visual Studio Code. After Visual Studio Code opens, a dialog box opens in the lower right corner, asking you to install the extension. Click Install to proceed.
